hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="RC-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init start
#vm image fixup /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init fixup
/puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'wget http://esb3.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ############ /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog-client.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'ps faxu' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog7_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-client_netstat.sh'
